author: {'steamid': '76561197960534803', 'num_games_owned': 653, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 332, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1712358979}
review:
Possibly the worst Resident Evil game I've ever played and I've played the Resident Evil 3 Demake.

- Generic predictable Story
- Broken A.I.
- Two interesting characters (Claire Redfield and Barry Burton) paired up with two of the most annoying forgettable characters (Moira Burton and Natalia) in an annoying Co-op style of gameplay.
- Nauseating shaky camera
- "Online Co-op" that only applies to the tacked on Raid mode and NOT the campaign that badly needs it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198825431580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 146, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1712084865}
review: Решила перепройти серию игр по Резику и тут поняла, что ни разу не играла в Revelations 2. Нужно было срочно наверстать упущенное, купила игру, наиграла где-то 2,5 часа и вот, посмотрев трейлер следующего эпизода, увидев весь тот эпик, который там происходил, я весело потерла ручки и.... тут меня посетила птица обломинго, ибо чтобы пройти игру до конца нужно каждый эпизод покупать отдельно за бабки (при покупке игры об этом нигде не указано). И у меня только один вопрос: Разрабы, вы там на приколе что ли? Знала бы, скачала с торрента, а не тратила лишние 4 доллара за полчаса игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098365213', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 502, 'playtime_at_review': 861, 'last_played': 1712059873}
review:
보통 스팀평가에서 대체로 긍정적이면 똥겜이다. 하지만 이건 게임성 문제로 까인게 아니라 캡콤이 게임을 에피소드별로 나누어서 파는 바람에  평가가 이렇게 되버렸다. 

한줄로 말하자면 평타는 친다. 진짜 겜 어디할 꺼 없나 싶을때 그냥 받아서 하면 아 그냥 할만은 하네. 그러니깐 동네 국밥같은 게임이다.

단점은 억까, 억지가 상당히 많다.  게임에서 상태이상이 여러가지 있는데. 상태이상을 제거하기 위한 여러가지 아이템들이 있다. 거기서 그 아이템을 허브처럼 단축키 지정이라도 하게 해줘야 하지 않을까 싶은데. 그딴거 없고 알아서 인벤토리 열어서 사용하라는게 솔직히 개꼴받았다.  애들한테 인디언밥당해서 죽기 일보직전인데. 그것까지 일일히 다 확인해서 꺼내야한다니 진짜 개꼴받았다. 
 그리고 포물선으로 거머리 날리는 놈있는데. 걔도 절대 안 맞을 각도에서 가만히 있어도 맞는데. 무조건 회피를 눌러야 피해진다. 더 열 받았던 것은 그 똥덩어리 맞으면 시야가 가려져서  또 거즈로 닦아야하는데. 그 아이템 창열면서 거즈 사용할려고 할쯤이면 애들이 인디언 밥하러 또 달려오기 떄문에 마음 편하게 꺼낼 수가 없다.  진짜 이거에 적응한다고 겜 삭제할까 말까 고민 심각하게 했다.

점수는 3점이요..3점...

author: {'steamid': '76561199019838847', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 985, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 985, 'last_played': 1682431516}
review:
[h1]《生化危机启示录2》[/h1]

这一代的采取了多结局的玩法。剧情紧凑严肃，人物形象塑造非常成功，尤其是巴瑞老父亲的慈爱与坚毅。整体故事在生化危机中也算是一流的存在。 

游戏性方面，操控双角色，与辅助角色直接来回切换，合作解密，以及体术后续连携。没有像6那样专注于体术，也没有丢失解密部分。

体术，解密，物资管理等恰到好处。恐怖氛围的烘托相较于4.5.6，也更胜一筹。
整体来说，纵观在老代生化危机中，这款也是更像生化危机的一代。

review: probably one of my least favorite RE games but it has it's charm, sort of fireboy and watergirl gameplay quirk if you're playing solo. The combat is improved from the first revelations game, the environment and atmosphere is well-done. Some major bugs, had weird visual clipping when I streamed it. [spoiler] There was also a bug at the very last boss battle that froze my characters, had to try several times to fix it. [/spoiler] As someone who've known of some of the plot beforehand I honestly could have passed it by, not super worth it imo if you're not genuinely passionate about the story and want to experience it for yourself, I'd much rather replay the older resident evil games, the modern remakes and new installments.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170254294', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 391, 'playtime_at_review': 1268, 'last_played': 1711795961}
review:
This is a first, but I would NOT be recommending this RE installment if not for the puzzles. I admit I had so much fun with them. But everything else felt so repetitive, story was not too engulfing or interesting. Visuals were such a drag (and yes, I know, RE visuals SHOULD indeed look dead and miserable) and the monsters felt like a step back for the RE franchise in general. Revelations 1 brought something new to the table. I had hoped I could say the same for this one.

Nevertheless, being the RE-tard that I am (see what I did there lol), I still felt some form of enjoyment overall and I will be finishing this game with eagerness and excitement towards the conclusion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198280287375', 'num_games_owned': 420, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 935, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1711780843}
review:
Une belle daube.
Bon déjà j'ai acheté le jeu en solde pour mon marathon de RE... et après le chapitre 1 le jeu m'informe qu'il faut aller sur le store pour continuer le jeu 
6 balles par épisodes d'un jeu de 2015

Et c'est une catastrophe.

L'IA est le point NOIR du jeu, qu'elle ai une arme à feu ou une arme au corps à corps elle reste comme une d*bile devant l'ennemi à se faire tabasser et n'utilise JAMAIS l'esquive.

Le nombre de fois ou j'ai fait une retraite pour éviter d'être submergé et qu'en me retournant t'avais Moira qui avait décidé d'utiliser son pied de biche en restant planté 
Du coup je l'a regardais tout au bout d'un couloir en me demandant quand est ce qu'elle déciderait de venir.

Beaucoup crachent sur RE5 mais au moins Sheva malgré le fait qu'elle avait un flingue restait près de nous ce qui permettait de faire des retraites et d'eviter de se faire défoncer.

Et quand l'IA a une arme à feu...

Déjà il faut débloquer la compétence pour que l'IA se défende.
Sauf qu'il est indiqué qu'elle fera tres peut de dégât.
On pourrait penser à une question d'équilibrage SAUF que c'est un jeu jouable en COOP et qu'il n'y a pas se problème la donc pourquoi nous brider la dessus.

Un simple ennemi qui était bloqué par une collision, Claire à mis une quarantaines de balles de flingue pour le terminer.

C'est pareil avec le pompe, auucn dégat.

Bordel mais en 2009 la tres charmante Sheva faisait du full auto CQBR avec une précision de 99.999 % 

Deuxième problème .
Les niveaux à parcourir son générique à en mourir.
Et pire encore tu te retape le même chemin avec le duo Joel et Eli Bary et la petite fille mais 6 mois plus tard.

Un vieux chemin couloiresque dans une foret.
Pour passer sur des couloirs d'une prison sans âme.
Et ensuite encore des couloirs de foret sans âme.
Avec des vieilles mécanique pour trouver des objet en appuyant sur le clic droit...

Je vais arrêter ce pavé infernal et bider parce que ce jeu est une daube et que tout le monde osef de cette daube

author: {'steamid': '76561198918347280', 'num_games_owned': 38, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1606972969}
review:
Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - это игра, которая сочетает в себе элементы экшена и приключения, а также предлагает режим совместной игры. Вот мой отзыв:
Плюсы:
Сюжет и атмосфера: Игра поддерживает качество и атмосферу серии Resident Evil. Вторая часть углубляется в опасные ситуации и интересные окружения, а враги становятся более смертоносными.
Режим Raid: Отличный режим, предлагающий более 150 индивидуальных миссий и разнообразных персонажей. Геймплей в режиме Raid динамичен и захватывающ.
Совместная игра: В игре можно играть в кооперативном режиме, и каждый персонаж имеет свои уникальные навыки, что делает геймплей интересным.
Минусы:
Отсутствие онлайн-игры: К сожалению, игра не предлагает онлайн-режима.
Графика и дизайн: Некоторые уровни выглядят скучно и могли бы быть более детализированными.
В целом, Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - это хороший спин-офф, который удовлетворит фанатов серии и предложит что-то новое . Однако стоит отметить, что для того чтобы пройти игру полностью, вам придется приобретать каждую главу за настоящие деньги в магазине Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330866453', 'num_games_owned': 1243, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 9629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9240, 'playtime_at_review': 2294, 'last_played': 1712415870}
review:
3.5/5

I'm not really sure what's up with the ratings on this one. Even though the quality of the story and characters is not really comparable to Revelations 1, the gameplay is so much better for me. It's far more fast paced, similar to RE6, I've liked the level design more here, especially in the beginning, and I really like the usual modern RE mechanics more, including the co-op with shared inventories and crafting, sprint / dodging mechanics and crucial melee combat compared to the much simplified mechanics in the previous game. One thing I see as a downside is that the co-op play isn't really made for multiplayer - one character does almost all of the work while the second one just follows and assists in finding treasures and removing some character-specific obstacles. However, I still think it's a really fun co-op experience.

I prefer this survival horror execution much more over the action horror execution of Revelations 1. This feels like Resident Evil. The atmosphere is much better, and the overall design just feels gnarly and twisted. What I really like are the boss fights. Even though I found them somewhat easy, the fight scenarios were good and I find the design of the boss characters just outstanding. Alex Wesker and Neil Fisher's mutations are crazy.

The raid mode is also just far better compared to the raid mode in Revelations 1. Better mission stages, much more characters, more weapons and more perks. It's a blast to play, especially with others.

Not a big fan of the Extra Episodes though.

If you're a Resident Evil fan, give this one a try. It's a really decent game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199178143831', 'num_games_owned': 13, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 132, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1711289465}
review:
Как то слабовато, если сравнивать с другими частями то тут простоватый сеттинг, вялые движения персонажей, катсцен о-очень мало и экшен тут тоже слабый, не пахнет вовсе, после шедевральной шестой части я по логике ожидал, что capcom добавят ещё больше экшена и боевика, но именно тут они вошли в хоррор, но это не пугает вовсе.  Я будто играю в мобильную игру. Единственное что зашло, это battle game, довольно необычно для серий резидента,  это не привычный нам режим наемники вовсе, это совершенно другое, много интересного контента завезли в этот новый режим, но чем больше играешь в него, тем больше ощущение того что ты играешь в типичную мобильную игру про выживание зомби 
Оценка в целом 7/10, не худшая и не лучшая часть

review:
resident evil markasına yakışmayan bir oyun.
karakterler çok monoton. arkada habis bir ses "I'm sorry, I'm sorry..." diyor ve barry'den tık yok. yanımızdaki cimcime de bir şey demiyor. mizahı ögeler çok zayıf. tek güldüğüm espri barry matkabı alınca "now this should give us a "hole" lot more options." demesi idi. karakterlerle bağ kuramadım. olamamış bir oyun. re6 bile daha iyiydi.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976979585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 771, 'playtime_at_review': 1986, 'last_played': 1712394839}
review:
前回プレイしたのはPS3のバイオ6で、それよりグラフィックは綺麗になっている。
ストーリーは自分で好きな時にセーブできないのですぐ終われないし、大して面白くもない。
セーブ中は画面がガクガク、数秒止まる事もあり、PCがフリーズしたのかと思う事もある。
持てるアイテムが少ないのに、重要なアイテムも持てないのは×。
字幕の待てとついて来てが逆になる場面があり、他のセリフもけっこうおかしい所がある。
エンディングもよくわからなかった。
やっぱり自分が好きなバイオは4だけかも。

レイドモードはちょっと面白いけど、
推奨レベル以下だと入手できないバッジがあるので、自分の好きなキャラだけで集めるのは不可能で残念。

author: {'steamid': '76561198080698104', 'num_games_owned': 612, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 59, 'playtime_at_review': 874, 'last_played': 1711220376}
review:
Great game, really loved everything about it (not including the DLCs *cough*), happy to see Barry back in action and the newly added cast are good in their own way, love how each person are limited based on past experiences, hoping for a revelations 3 to be a thing, tho highly unlikely.

Highly recommend! If anyone is seeking a co-operative game this is worth it tho, you should know the second player is quite limited!! and it's LOCAL CO-OP.

author: {'steamid': '76561199643338468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1711177392}
review: Cara, vou te falar sobre "Resident Evil: Revelations 2". Acredite, eu me senti em um filme de terror! Os pontos positivos são muitos: a história é de tirar o fôlego, os personagens são incríveis e a atmosfera é de arrepiar até os cabelos mais endurecidos. A jogabilidade é desafiadora, mas às vezes pode ficar um pouco repetitiva. Porém, os momentos de puro terror e as reviravoltas na trama compensam qualquer ponto negativo. Se você tá a fim de uma aventura cheia de sustos e adrenalina, "Revelations 2" é a pedida certa!

author: {'steamid': '76561198108139823', 'num_games_owned': 379, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1756, 'last_played': 1710961312}
review: Not a terrible game, if it had come out in 2012. By 2016 standards, this is pretty bad. By modern standards, it just feels like a quickly pumped out game with minimal enemy variety, lackluster coop support (only local play supported), and extremely boring 2nd Player experience (player 2 is always a pacifist and cannot wield weapons except for a crowbar or brick). The fact that you have to pay for each episode (each of which are only 2 chapters) is insulting. While the game is a definite step up from resident evil 5 in a mechanical sense, the game design, story, and replay-ability are very low quality. I'd say this game is only worth it if its on sale and you're willing to brave 8-10-ish hours of a pretty mid gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561199129061802', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1491, 'last_played': 1710895295}
review:
Гра явно недооцінена. Ставлю тверді 7,5. Прикро щоб повністю пройти гру, доводиться купляти епізоди, однак з комплектом - це доволі правдива ціна (якщо по акції 160+- грн). Спойлерити не буду, однак фінал був дуже занадто пафосний, але сподобався. 

Плюси:
+музичний супровід
+виклики в певних боях
+напруженість сюжету, за яким цікаво спостерігати
+пряма стрільба без всякого зайвого
+додаткові костюми (з комплекта) дуже сподобались, одразу різноманіття додали
+додатковий контент (2 длс до основної гри та режим рейд для тих хто не настрілявся)

Мінуси:
-відсутність складних головоломок, та впринципі їх тут взагалі 2 чи 3
-іноді стикався з поганим балансом на боса, тому доводилось бити ножем та трубою (особливо на високій складності)
-другий герой по суті допомагає тільки з економічною складовою, але описується лором таке відношення
-погана якість кат-сцен
-графіка бажає кращого для 2024, однак моделі персонажів гарно оформленні

Плюс та мінус: вплетення попередьої частини (5) у лор, однак виглядає це не так файно.

Герої не погано прописані, тут і Баррі с 1 резіка, його донька (топ до речі), Клер Редфіл, Наталія, та інші 

Купляти раджу, якщо пройшов основні частини резіка. На мій погляд ця частина виграє 5 та перший ревелейшн.

author: {'steamid': '76561199467270979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1050, 'playtime_at_review': 617, 'last_played': 1712414531}
review:
A very fun and underrated Resident Evil entry into the series. Revelations returns featuring Claire Redfield, Barry Burton and his daughter Moira. Set in a secluded island somewhere in Russia, a scientist under the same last name Wesker has set up a deadly cat and mouse game. A new virus that's triggered with fear is unleashed and only the strong willed can suppress it and be able to escape. Scavenge for ammo and crafting healing items return. Upgrading weapons on workbenches to better the offensive and take the fight to this new terror. 

Raid Mode returns, and better than ever. More characters, better and edgier gun play. The catch? Character levels are locked to each. In other words...you have to play each and every one, to raise their levels. The good news is you can customise character skills and weapon perks. Thus adding to the fun. Furthermore, there are daily bonuses where one specific character and another of your choosing can get experience boost for faster leveling. Not to mention Revive Crystals, that allow you to (duh) revive on the spot after getting killed with all your ammo and heals replenished. Great for Daily Bonus Missions, but costs you a medal or two during regular missions. These crystals are rewarded when completing Daily Bonus Missions up to a max of 30. Quick tip, make sure to to use these Revive Crystals when tackling Regular higher level missions to make room for your next bonus claim. Since your limited to holding only 30 of them. Happy Hunting!   

If you tried Revelations 1 this is your next stop. For the rest of us RE die-hards, a definite must. (^_^)

author: {'steamid': '76561199077683968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2207, 'last_played': 1710436437}
review: In my opinion, this is the most realistic Resident Evil in terms of gameplay. You can move while shooting, you can dodge, no item box, which means you really have to manage the items you're carrying. Your AI companion is not as stupid as in the first game, and you get to control them. The gameplay is so fun. The story is really good too. Raid Mode offers tons of replayability. Claire and Moira have sexy outfits. Man, this is peak Resident Evil. Every fan should have this in their library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274366324', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 1003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1003, 'last_played': 1710257612}
review: RE5 sonrası ve RE6 öncesi hikayenin işlendiği bir oyun. Kötü değil hatta yer yer çok zevkli olduğu kısımlar da var ama ortalamaya baktığımızda genel olarak 6-7 aralığında deneyimler yaşatıyor. Sonlara doğru güzel açıldığı için 7 puan uygun gibi. Hikaye olarak da RE lore bilgisine hakimseniz tam olarak anlayacaksınız ama aksi takdirde biraz havada kalabilir.

author: {'steamid': '76561199465961277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 360, 'playtime_at_review': 868, 'last_played': 1712307064}
review: If you are a fan of the Resident Evil games after 4 then this game is for you. The controls are great, the co-op gameplay is quite fun and diverse plus the scary and dark atmosphere of the game fully immerses you in the story and adds a lot of value to the horror survival element of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199327132356', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1710159789}
review: 作为一款生化危机的外传游戏，我觉得更加阴暗风格和残酷的剧情没有什么问题。但是作为一款卡普空的游戏，一款游戏战斗会让人感到无聊不好玩就已经是最大的问题了。巴瑞篇章的战斗问题还好，隐形怪的设计很有意思，两人切换来找到怪物的弱点和位置很有意思，反观克莱尔篇的战斗，则可以用无聊透顶来形容，首先是敌人种类的问题，敌人类型不算少，但是设计的都很无聊，和之前每一作对比都是退步，尤其是boss战，尼尔的战斗无聊透顶，boss不停的撞南墙，你只需要等他把南墙撞破然后开枪，然后去下一个南墙后面等着，怪物形象设计的也很烂，没有特色，子弹打在敌人身上没有任何反馈，克莱尔篇的潜行元素可以用意义不明来形容，敌人AI过于弱智导致被发现基本是百分百，而敌人死亡也没有任何奖励，可以对敌人使用体术的敌人发聩太差，让近战无法融入平时的战斗，碰见敌人最优解就是突突突，让克莱尔的战斗乐趣为零，莫伊拉这个人物更是空气，单人情况下，与其在丧尸靠近前用手电筒去照，不如直接用抢打死，克莱尔已经有刀了，所以撬棍的作用只剩下了开箱子和开门，莫伊拉这个角色完全没有存在的必要。无聊的boss战，无聊的敌人，原因不明的角色，让这款游戏的战斗方式只能用悲剧来形容。

author: {'steamid': '76561197984449763', 'num_games_owned': 600, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1187, 'last_played': 1709772684}
review:
This is a game that on paper should be better than its predecessor, but due to a combination of different decisions it’s marginally better at best and I’m not sure if I had any more fun with it than the first Revelations. 

Mouse controls are a disaster, and you might as well use a controller if your mouse can’t do low DPI settings (400dpi ideally). 

Aside from some late game sections with Barry, the level design is again mediocre. The combat is much improved over the first game but annoying mechanics like stealth takedowns and crouch walking have been added. I didn’t care for the setting or the story, and the dialog is remarkably bad. Overall as a Resident Evil fan, this is one I’ll replay once per decade as a change of pace but the first six numbered entries in the series are all way better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287809553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1706024823}
review:
远程同乐通关的 其实是很好的一部生化危机 剧情很有意思 解谜难度也适中 就是克莱尔篇有点缺补给 巴瑞篇战斗太少了全是解密反而补给很多 不太平衡 但喜欢老生化危机的话推荐游玩 不然没重置的话不是很推荐 更推荐去玩生化6

缺点主要是画质太老了 双人上下分屏体验很差 另外其中一个扮演次要角色是不能使用枪械的 这一点很烦 跑酷那关稍微一点失误要从头来很不合理 另外就是好坏结局的判定 要是没看过攻略基本上很少会有人第一次能打出来

author: {'steamid': '76561199473947911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1225, 'last_played': 1710873219}
review:
Prós:

•A gameplay é muito divertida e fluida,os cenários são muito bem ambientados com uma ótima atmosfera de survival horror e o jogo também tem uma ótima variação de inimigos e Bosses(aquela mosca invisível é insuportável).

•Os modos extras, principalmente o modo raide, dão um fator replay muito forte pro jogo.

•O revelations é bem survival horror,ainda mais nas maiores dificuldades,o que significa que,se vc não se cuidar,cê sempre vai ficar zerado de item.

•A história é aquele feijão com arroz que todo Resident Evil entrega,o que eu acho engraçado é o nome do jogo ser Revelations e não revelar cacete nenhum.

__________________________________________
Contras:

•Sinceramente,ter que ficar comprando episódio por episódio é um pé no saco.Recomendo comprar a versão deluxe quando tiver em promoção,pois nela vem todos os episódios + as dlcs.

•Recomendo fortemente chamar um amigo pra jogar pois a experiência será muito melhor,a Capcom deve ter investido uns 10 reais na hora de fazer a IA dos personagens.Então,se vc decidir jogar solo,saiba que vc vai fazer o trabalho de duas pessoas,o que pode ser bem tiltante em algumas partes do jogo.


•O jogo também sofre de queda de FPS mas eu não tive tanto problema com isso,o jogo manteve os 60fps boa parte do tempo.
_____________________________

Resumo:

Revelations 2 pode ter seus problemas mas,pra mim,tá longe de ser um jogo ruim.Ele é divertido,a história e os personagens são legais,sem dúvidas é um bom jogo,e meio injustiçado eu diria.Se você é fã de residência do mal, principalmente do 4, você vai adorar esse jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133140926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1638003149}
review: Game is good for the time it came out. I did like the concept how the co'op played. I repurchased this on steam and used to play on the PlayStation. I also appreciate the remakes for the games that came out for Resident evil recently like 2, 3 and 4. I think now would be a great time to bring out Outbreak 1 and 2. It was a great game at the time it came out, but it was ahead of its time. I think pulling the game out and modernizing it like the games mentioned, would have a chance to actually shine. I know Resident Evil Resistance and REverse are attempts to get back into online environment. I think they were a good concept, but were not a complete game. People love the work you do with puzzles and the horror, Playing with friends and enjoying the scare and story together is fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198962926884', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1709369448}
review:
For those who saw this and read " Online Co-op " and thought you can play with your online friends, sorry to disappoint you but its a blatant lie. But if you aren't planning to buy this to play with friends then good for you.


" Online Co-op " What type of bs is that, I wanted to play this with my long distance boyfriend. Bought the game and tested it out, I was lost because I couldnt find where it said " Online co-op campaign/Join friends etc ". Did a quick google search, ik I should've done before purchasing it and that was not very smart of me. Lets just say, I refunded the game.

review: 其实这一部才是我最喜欢的一部，大概是白月光的存在。自2023年在Switch上通关以后，我念念不忘，于是又在Steam上温故了大部分剧情。双女主共同携手作战，让我嗑了好久。她们是多年好友，在这里克服了重重恐惧，最终抵达终点。同时，这部游戏里也讲了一段复杂的父女关系。小娜塔莉亚会不会在以后的游戏里出现呢？或许她能同罗丝玛丽见一面。

author: {'steamid': '76561198249078848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 6133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6133, 'last_played': 1677908140}
review:
This game was so underrated, especially compared to the first one. I liked the original and binged it when it came out, but hands down Rev 2 tops it in every area and looks better. For starters, gunplay, story, and setting are better. Rev 1 had memorable areas like the Mall and the swimming parts, but a lot of the ship just felt like a maze and wasn't fun. Rev 2 doesn't have any of those issues and introduces new mechanics like stealth and companion puzzles that spice things up. The RAID mode is also improved in Rev 2. More weapons, more interesting maps to go through. There are RAID-exclusive maps imported from RE6 and beyond that are great in particular.

Hope that Capcom makes a 3rd Revelations, this series deserves more love!

author: {'steamid': '76561198083097958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 371, 'playtime_forever': 1188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1709072060}
review:
結論言うと、面白いです。

1と違い携帯機からの移植でなく、PS3発売が最初だった事もあり、現在やっても悪くないです。

常に状況に合わせて二人組のどちらか一方を操作と言うシステムは賛否両論でしょうが、異色バイオとしては良作と思います。
（相方が懐中電灯持ちで一人が銃持ちなんて、どう考えても分業に無理ありすぎ。）

ゲーム中の明るさ設定の微妙さ（暗いので明るくすると白っぽくなりすぎる。）も気になりますが、この辺は個人差もあるとは思います。

ちなみに、元々がエピソード毎の単品DL販売と言った事もあり、恐らく日本では10年近くもエピソード1以外は安くならず、23年末セールでやっと全エピソード900円くらいになったと言うバイオの中でも変わった経緯のある作品です。（PS3の全エピソード収録パッケージ版も、PS4での再販された為とは思いますが、あまり値崩れ無しだった様です。）

ま～興味があればプレイしても損は無いと思います。
今更ながらオススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561197983487962', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1043, 'last_played': 1708919529}
review:
TLDR: 
One of the best Resident Evil games due to the story and refined shooting gameplay

Pros:
- Great story and voice-acting throughout.  Not 'too cheesy', like many other titles in the series.  The dual timelines and 4-playable characters keep things interesting without ever losing focus or breaking up the experience.
- Some of the best gunplay in the series.  Melee combos are much more streamlined than before, inventory management has better UI than usual, and feedback is fantastic.  All of the weapons are satisfying to use.
- Good weapons/player-skill upgrade systems feel fair/balanced
- Plenty of replayability and content as per usual

Cons:
- Other than the character models, the graphics don't hold up well in 2024
- Occasionally frustrating gameplay due to the punishing lack of resources
- DLC content is pretty weak compared to other titles in the series

author: {'steamid': '76561199027081060', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 500, 'last_played': 1708905576}
review: Para deixar claro não sou um expert em Resident Evil como um ex-colega. Resumidamente, na minha opinião, que já joguei outros da série, este jogo é chato para caramba. Não existem desafios nele, os inimigos "difíceis" são apenas esponjas de bala que têm um ataque muito previsível hitkill, ele possui uma ambientação "sinistra" mas mesmo assim nao da medo algum. Sei que o jogo foi realizado com um orçamento menor. E o fato de uma única escolha ESTUPIDAMENTE aleatória mudar o final do jogo me deixa mais irritado ainda. Porque fui na inocência fazer aquelas duas DLCs podres achando que me mostrariam o final bom, mas acabei me sabotando e perdendo uma hora da minha vida com mapas reaproveitados e mecânicas lixo. Se você tiver muito saco e se importar apenas com a história, que na minha opinião é boa, esse jogo é para você. Mas se você quer se divertir jogando Resident Evil, talvez não seja o melhor para você. E compre apenas a edição deluxe.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971177676', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 5437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5437, 'last_played': 1708656244}
review:
エピソード配信方式で発売されてしまったため不評を買い、誤解された不運な良ゲー。
現在は全エピソード＆DLCセット売りなので、良サバイバルホラーゲーとして遊べる。

半年前の話（クレア&モイラ編）と現在の話（バリー&ナタリア編）を交互にプレイするので、同じマップでも状況が変わっていて面白い。DLCはエピソードを補完する内容になっているが、ゲームとしてはあまり面白くないのが残念。せっかく半年間のサバイバル生活を描くのだから、バイオ版ゾンビサバイバルクラフトゲーだったら最高だったのに。

前作からおなじみのレイドモードは楽しく遊べるし、ストーリーモードも良かったのだが、やはり前作に比べると何か物足りない感じがした。前作と今作を比較してみて何が違うのか、印象的なポイントを考えてみると以下のようになった。

リベ１：豪華客船 × 海洋ゾンビ × お色気ダイバースーツ
リベ２：謎の孤島 × 普通ゾンビ × 普通の服

結果、前作はいつものバイオとはちょっと違う雰囲気のゲームで異質な感じがしたが、今作は普通よりで何となく物足りない感じがするのだと思い至った。もし今後リベ３があるならば、シチュエーション、ゾンビ、服装はプレイヤーの想像を超えるものを期待したいところ。

昨年からセール時はとっても安くなっており、サバイバルホラーゲーとしては普通に面白いのでおすすめです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198147196442', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1708500719}
review:
Incredibly poorly optimized game. Constantly stutters and the CPU usage is crazy. My system's using anywhere from 35 to 85-90% (4c8t) while the game's running. Lowering the affinity doesn't help as then the game will stutter even more and will frequently drop below 60.

To put it into perspective, this game's using more cores/threads than RE4 2023, while managing to run and look way worse. Don't bother with this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199161425599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1678490507}

author: {'steamid': '76561198089722403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 1046, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1046, 'last_played': 1708460707}
review:
I liked the general story direction, but there are definitely some negatives for me. I played this on the hardest difficulty and felt that for some of the boss fights, you had to be perfect with your ammo or you would completely run out.

Dislike:

- Similar to RE0, 5 and 6, you have an AI that follows you around and isn't that smart.
- After reading a document, your volumes seems to increase 5x for a short period of time.
- There is one enemy type that is completely invisible unless you use smoke bombs or [spoiler] use Natalia's ability and then switch back[/spoiler] which was a bit of a pain.
- [spoiler]It's mentioned that this island is remote, yet they have cars, buildings, mines etc. How would they be able to do this if nobody knew about the place?[/spoiler]
- [spoiler]The last boss fight was a bit underwhelming.[/spoiler]
- Capcom's anti-consumer DRM that prevents modding.
- Capcom forcing you to pay per episode (unless you get the deluxe edition).

If you would like to play this, I'd recommend getting it on a sale or from a third party reseller. I don't think it's worth more than £5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140110515', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 995, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 995, 'last_played': 1708452664}
review:
Вот и пройдена вторая часть revelations - откровения. Здесь графон уже получше, сам сюжет и в целом геймплей разнообразнее, бодрее и я бы сказал, что даже интереснее. Не хуже первой части откровений, но лучше, это точно. Здесь мне тоже всë понравилось. 

В этой части у нас 4 эпизода по основному сюжету и 2 дополнительных эпизода, которые закрывают, скажем так, сюжетные дыры. 

В этот раз новый вирус, новые зомби и персонажи, различные боссы и локации, есть некоторые отсылки на первую часть откровений. В общем и целом - годно. С русской озвучкой проходить, как и в первой части - было очень здорово, лучше погружаешься в сюжет. Я впечатлëн, серия игр резидента радует:) 

Как и первую часть откровений - рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198383183162', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1708424733}
review:
cara, esse é disparado o pior resident evil q eu já joguei na vida INTEIRA, não fui capaz nem de terminar o cap 1 de tédio, e mesmo que eu quisesse, me recuso a colaborar com essa prática doentia de separar um jogo por capítulos COMPRÁVEIS, principalmente p comprar pedaços de uma campanha TÃO mid.
- os controles são ruins.
- a mecânica da moira é praticamente infuncional.
- as animações são ruins.
- a poluição visual desse jogo é ABSURDA. (quando tu fica sangrando, c n consegue ver NADA pq fica piscando um monte de sangue na tela PQP QUE IDEIA DE MERDA, TINHA QUE SER >>NO MEIO<< DA TELA PORRA????)
- o jogo é MAL OTIMIZADO PRA CARALHO. (MERMÃO, MEU PC CUMPRE TODOS OS REQUISITOS RECOMENDADOS E O JOGO CONSEGUIU TRAVAR NA CUTSCENE INICIAL KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK)
e centenas de outros problemas como falta de textura, inimigos ficando invisíveis e por aí vai.
espero que a campanha desse jogo melhore com o passar dos capítulos, mas graças a deus n estarei aq pra ver pq essa é uma das dropadas q eu sei q jamais irei me arrepender de ter feito.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150162997', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 3362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3362, 'last_played': 1708350761}
review: A trama acompanha Claire Redfield e Moira Burton, filha do personagem Barry Burton, que são sequestradas e levadas para uma ilha sombria controlada pela misteriosa organização "Terra Save". Ao mesmo tempo, Barry parte em uma busca desesperada para encontrar sua filha. A história é contada de forma intercalada entre as perspectivas de Claire e Barry, proporcionando uma visão abrangente dos eventos. A atmosfera sombria e a narrativa envolvente mantêm os jogadores intrigados do início ao fim.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982356540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1032, 'last_played': 1708234830}
review:
Pros: -The opening cutscene (which is crazy fun)
         -The ending slow-mo cutscene when the villain dies
         -Can be fun if you play co-op
         -For hardcore RE fans only

Cons: -Moira
          -some enemies are Invisible
          -Badly optimized for PC (weird glitches and had to play with the framerate in the options to finish the final boss)
          -Every episode is basically play scenario A with Claire/Moira and revisit the same location AGAIN but with Barry/Nikita for scenario B. Awful.
          -Uncreative enemies (muddy zombies or muddy zombies with hats for Barry or weird experiment zombies with or without hats when you play as Claire
          -No variety in the locations (Rundown buildings and sewers)
          -Feels double it's actual lenght
          -Even worse dialogues than you can imagine
          -Pretentious Kafka references that clash with the rest of the game

-Since I can't give a "Meh" I will say that this game is for hardcore RE fans only and even then it would be as a curiosity piece above the RE: Survivor light gun game series. Try it if you can get it for very cheap. Would absolutely NOT recommend to new fans or people looking to jump into their first RE game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198960112443', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 895, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1708195393}
review: Cara como tava boa a historia desse jogo, todo o mistério, a forma de narrativa em duas timelines diferentes, desde inicio o jogo instiga e muito a curiosidade já que ele foi feito em capítulos, cada final faz você ficar sedento pelo próximo capitulo, a gameplay esta muito boa até mesmo para os dias atuais , os gráficos também puta jogo foda, pena que demorei de mais para jogar este jogo. mas agora que zerei posso dizer que ele esta fácil no meu top 5 dos jogos da franquia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198327242354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1627537741}
review: 游戏继承了前作的恐怖渲染气氛，且更加强烈，与同伴的配合操作进一步扩大了游戏的可玩性，新道具的引入也使得游戏有了更多玩法。诟病就是优化太渣，无论是PC还是PS3上的丢帧问题严重影响了游戏的流畅度。另外分章节出售的这个销售思路也是个奇葩。

author: {'steamid': '76561199581593180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8398, 'last_played': 1707872927}
review:
Observação: este review tem como finalidade descrever minha experiência com o game sem abordar a história do mesmo a fim de não dar spoilers e nem estragar a experiência de novos jogadores. (APROVEITEM!);

Bom dia para você que está lendo minha primeira review, venho por meio deste, citar e mencionar minha experiência como um todo a respeito deste belíssimo, porém "demorado" jogo denominado "Resident Evil Revelations 2" ou "Biohazard Revelations 2" (como você preferir chamar); minha história com o game começou uns anos atrás na plataforma "Xbox One" foi quando tive meu primeiro contato, na época só havia jogado a "campanha principal" e razoavelmente o "Modo de Raide", no entanto já havia marcado minhas lembranças de maneira positiva.
 Contudo, no fim do ano de 2023 minha jornada recomeça com esta obra audiovisual, desta vez jogando aqui no PC pela "Steam", e minha intenção com o jogo desde o reinício era relembrar da história jogando novamente a "campanha principal" e logo após isto, realizar todas as conquistas do mesmo, porém como você leitor deve estar imaginando (ou não), não foi uma tarefa nem um pouco simples, pois o jogo me deu mais trabalho do que eu poderia me dar conta de que aconteceria, dias e dias se passaram e mesmo com a "demora", a realização de todos os meus feitos dentro do jogo foram imensamente satisfatórias, isto é, deve-se uma parte ao fato da nostalgia por estar jogando o jogo pela "segunda vez", e outra parte pelo desenvolvimento da narrativa da história tornando então minha experiência muito positiva mais uma vez.
 Enfim, depois de uma longa, porém incrível jornada por este game, pude então realizar todas as conquistas do game, assim então "platinando" o mesmo; e por fim, mesmo que em algumas partes o jogo seja muito linear ou monótono, seja por repetições desnecessárias ou qualquer que seja o motivo, este é um jogo da franquia "Resident Evil" que todos os jogadores que gostam da mesma, deveriam dar ao menos uma chance para experimentar o que este maravilhoso spin-off tem a oferecer.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995862041', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 928, 'last_played': 1710896800}
review:
10/10

Очень мрачный и жуткий спин-офф. Всё как мы любим)
Дух и атмосфера оригинальных Resident Evil никуда не делся. Сурвайвал на месте. Хоррор тоже. 
Камера из за плеча от 3 лица. Модельки, звуки, анимации оружия - это просто какое то запрещенное порно. Импакт от стрельбы невероятный! Редко такое встречается в видеоиграх. Также хорошо проработан дизайн и модельки главных героев. 
Вся игра проходится в паре, но кооп режима для кампании нет. Можно и даже нужно переключаться между персонажами в реальном времени. Я бы сказал так: один из них боевой, с огнестнелом, ножом и гранатами, другой со своей спец способностью, оружием ближнего боя и тоже возможностью использовать гранаты и предметы лечения. Впервые во франшизе можно передвигаться на корточках (стелс), но не обязательно для прохождения. Всегда можно действовать агрессивно и шумно, баланс игровой соблюден, поэтому пройти игру можно и так и так без проблем.
Место действия - остров, принадлежащий ВСР (Восточно - Славянской Республике). Инфраструктура на нём, как в странах СССР и бывшего СССР: жилые здания, заводы, фабрики, фермы, плакаты (буквально как в СССР), радио на русском языке, хотя вся игра на английском
Заражённые очень мерзкие, жуткие и страшные

Из минусов:
Местами немного проседает темп, ничего не происходит, только ходишь, осматриваешь все, собираешь предметы
Но таких моментов очень мало, встречаются редко и по сути за уши притянутый пункт, потому что в совокупности куча положительных моментов это с лихвой перекрывает!

author: {'steamid': '76561198335176209', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 3796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3792, 'last_played': 1707646156}
review: 生化危机启示录2》个人评价【10/9】-（注：购买时建议购买豪华版以体验完整剧情）本作剧情发生在以亚历克斯.威斯克带领着以史都华为首的研究团队在俄罗斯领海的赞恩岛上展开实验，做出了斯宾塞所设想的永生计划所筛选容器的病毒—恐惧病毒，只有经受住恐惧的人才能成为容器，再将记忆传输到躯壳，经过6个月的稳定期，便完成了所谓的永生，而我们主角克莱儿和莫伊拉也被FBC的间谍兼泰拉塞弗的老板给卖了，被带到了赞恩岛上，开始为生存而不断的斗争，直至6个月后巴瑞为寻找自己的女儿莫伊拉而来到岛上，刚好遇见了娜塔莉亚，一老一少结伴而行，不断寻找着真相。这作在角色的操控上不在像生化6那样生硬，体感上极佳，而游戏整体也不再像是5代和6代的单纯突突，而更多的重心是在解密、恐怖元素、互动上，并且需要我们在两个不同的主角来回切换以完成不同的谜题。以及额外的突击模式，突突就完了。

author: {'steamid': '76561199276187214', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1009, 'last_played': 1707759325}
review:
[h2][b] O que falar sobre Revelations 2? [/b][/h2]

Como uma fã das franquias de Resident Evil, jogar e ADORAR Revelations 2 não seria diferente. Desde o início do jogo, você experimenta aquela sensação de terror tenebrosa (no gostinho que o infarto gosta), revivendo e aflorando essa característica (terror) dos jogos que todo mundo adora!

Joguei Revelations 1 e adorei, particularmente, estava com altas expectativas em Revelations 2 e ele atendeu tudo: Me surpreendeu com o final da história e dos personagens, principalmente as: REVELAÇÕES. kkk q piada ruim, enfim: (me abstenho aqui devido aos spoilers, rs) 

Uma coisa que acho muito interessante e importante ressaltar caso queira jogar antes de experimentar revelations 2 completamente. O jogo traz REFERÊNCIAS que adoro saber dos outros jogos (inclusive já jogados por mim anteriormente de iniciar esse), como: Revelations 1, RE5 e RE6.

Confesso, RE Revelations 2 foi um dos únicos a realmente me dar medo. Como consequência disso, tomei vários sustos com os bichos e fiquei tensa 90% do tempo devido a ambientação impecável e a trilha sonora desgraç@d4 que te deixa nervosooooo. Nota 10 quanto a isso.

Eu não tenho o que reclamar sobre a jogabilidade do jogo em si, mas acredito que se fosse apontar um ponto negativo do jogo, seria a péssima otimização, visto que jogos mais pesados rodam/rodaram no meu notebook e esse em específico me irritava um pouco em alguns cenários que ele se demonstrava bastante mal otimizado. Entretanto, se você tiver uma máquina das boas, acredito que isso definitivamente não será um problema para você.

Por fim, venho enaltecer ao BOSS que enfrentamos no final. Puta merda! Finalmente alguém com uma determinação coerente que não seja apenas querer destruir tudo porque odeia tudo e todos (brincadeiras à parte), apenas jogando para obter a experiência completa. 

O final do jogo em si foi a minha parte preferida (arrepiei todinha 3x). [spoiler] Moira estar viva realmente me deixou muito emocionada, já que o jogo dava a ideia de que ela realmente estava morta e que só estávamos atrás de matar a Alex para acabar com tudo. OUTRA COISA: FUCKING CLAIRE REDFIELD DE CABELO CURTO!!! MEUS AMORESSS!! [/spoiler] Com isso, dou meu veredito final: COMPREM! JOGUEM! LEVEM SUSTO! E, PRINCIPALMENTE, DESFRUTEM ESTA OBRA DE ARTE!!! 

Ps: Jill Valentine on top!

author: {'steamid': '76561198970880829', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 124051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77916, 'last_played': 1710784717}
review:
As a die-hard fan of the Resident Evil franchise, I can confidently say that Resident Evil Revelations 2 is one of the best titles in the series. From its engaging story to its intense gameplay, all aspects of this game combine to create an unforgettable experience for players.

One of the standout features of Resident Evil Revelations 2 is its captivating storyline. The game takes place between the events of Resident Evil 5 and Resident Evil 6, and follows the story of Claire Redfield and Moira Burton as they navigate their way through a remote island filled with terrifying creatures - Featuring Barry Burton and newcomer Natalia. The plot twists and turns, keeping players on the edge of their seats as they uncover the mysteries of the island and the sinister Umbrella Corporation behind it all.

But what truly elevates Resident Evil Revelations 2 is its Raid mode. This mode allows players to team up with a friend or go solo to take on various challenges and missions. The variety and intensity of these missions make for an exhilarating experience, and the option to play with a friend adds an extra layer of fun and excitement. Moreover, the rewards earned in Raid mode can be used in the main game, giving players the opportunity to unlock new weapons and upgrades.

The gameplay in Resident Evil Revelations 2 is also top-notch. The third-person perspective and controls are smooth and intuitive, making it easy to navigate through the game. The combat mechanics are also well-executed, with a good mix of action and survival elements. The game also introduces some new elements, such as the ability to switch between characters during gameplay, adding a unique twist to the classic Resident Evil formula.

In terms of graphics and sound, Resident Evil Revelations 2 sets the bar high. The detailed environments, realistic character models, and eerie atmosphere all contribute to the overall experience. The sound effects and soundtrack are also spot on, adding to the tension and suspense of the game.

Overall, Resident Evil Revelations 2 is a must-play for any fan of the Resident Evil series. From its gripping story to its addictive gameplay, it offers everything that makes a great horror game. And with the addition of the Raid mode, it is a game that will keep players engaged long after the main story is completed. I highly recommend giving it a try, you won't be disappointed.

review:
╔════════════════════════════════════════╗
CO-OP CAMPAIGN CAN ONLY BE DONE THROUGH LOCAL PLAY
╚════════════════════════════════════════╝
If you wish to play through the story with a friend online, you would have to use the Remote Play function on Steam, and deal with the split-screen. Me and my friend did this, and there was little issue with lag or setup. I believe there are other third-party software to enable local play online with less issue, but this was the only immediately available one for us.

Other than that, the game's pretty good. It gets a bit too edgy in some areas, but it nails it on atmosphere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116546204', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 769, 'last_played': 1702632804}
review:
(I PLAYED REVELATIONS 2 BEFORE DRM WAS RELEASED, I AM MAKING THIS REVIEW ABOUT THE GAME, AND I DO BELIEVE CAPCOM IS STUPID FOR ADDING IT THOUGH)

I hate whenever I am with my RE friend group and I talk about revelations and they legit do not know what I am even talking about. 

Revelations 2 is an amazing addition to the resident evil franchise. I would also say it is kind of like resident evil 6 in a good way because it has a lot of action and such.

I still believe revelations one though is a lot better due to the fact it was more centered around horror but I still extremely adore 2.

Puzzles in this game are extremely fun and the boss fights are really balanced. Revelations 2 has a lot more replayability than other resident evils.

Ending was bad at first due to me getting the bad ending, but once I got the good ending I was pretty happy with this game.

That’s about all I can say I may edit this more when I feel like it, but I will say that if you want to play RE6 you must play rev2 cuz the good ending instantly gets you into re6

author: {'steamid': '76561199168165712', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1985, 'last_played': 1707149661}
review:
Este es uno de los mejores RE, balance perfecto entre terror y acción, buen cast de personajes, tiene historia principal (es buena), modo raid, 2 capitulos extras y formas diferentes de jugar a la historia principal que son mas desafiantes, el OST es impecable especialmente el del modo Raid como Seek and Prey High Speed Heroes, buenos gráficos, mecanicas nuevas y experimentales como el Esquive, hay variedad de armas y se sienten muy bien al usarlas, tambien tiene modo Coop tanto para modo Historia como para modo Raid, el modo Raid tambien tiene varios personajes entre ellos algunos cameos de los favoritos de siempre y ademas varios trajes seleccionables para algunos, tambien hay más variedad de armas ahi y de formas de personalizarlas. para mi este RE es un 9/10, en fin, es un juego que vale mucho la pena.. pero..

tiene 2 problemas lastimosamente, el primero y el que mas jode es la optimización, esta muy mal optimizado, da tirones seguidos y caidas de fps jodidas, la pase terrible en ese sentido pero al menos logre acostumbrarme.. ojala solucionen esto con una actualización algún día (si diosito quiere)
el otro problema es que el modo Historia no tiene Coop Online.. solo puede jugarse Coop a traves de Remote Play y es obligatorio tener 2 mandos (el mando 2 tiene que apretar Start para iniciar, lo mismo en modo Raid) despues en el modo Raid si tiene Coop Online y con Remote Play.

ahi va uno de los mejores RE, ojala le solucionen sus problemas de optimización (el año pasado lanzaron varias actualizaciones para RE5, por qué para este no?) ah y si lo van a comprar miren de comprarlo bien, porque se compra el primer capitulo y luego los demas (compren la version completa) y yap.. Moira besto gurl.

review:
"我在閱讀卡夫卡的《蛻變》的時候，不禁覺得這是作者的自傳，而書中的主角格裡高爾·薩姆沙就是卡夫卡自己。

卡夫卡生前從事一般的行業，也過著平凡的生活。儘管如此，他卻寫出充滿著瘋狂和絕望的出色作品。他平常會為了日常生活打拚，而寫作則是他的宣洩管道。但是他的家人和朋友們無法理解他的作品，也無法和他互動。我相信他很寂寞，被周遭世界孤立。

卡夫卡最終病倒了，在病床上度過人生最後的階段。當他的身體感受到極端的痛苦時，他的心靈也被各種恐懼所折磨。對死亡的恐懼、對未知事物的恐懼、以及被孤立的恐懼。就是這份恐懼讓卡夫卡的作品如此豐富，因為他有能力精準地審視瘋狂和苦難，並且讓這些概念成為他寫作的原動力。

卡夫卡生前只有出版過些許作品，在臨終前，他把他的作品託付給一名友人，並要求他不要閱讀內容，直接將他們燒毀。幸好友人看出卡夫卡作品的價值，選擇忽略卡夫卡的遺志，替後世將它們保留了下來。今日卡夫卡的作品當中，那栩栩如生描述恐懼的文筆，依舊觸動著讀者的心。

就是這份恐懼在驅使我們、鞭策我們。恐懼是人類的本能，也是讓我們存活的基本情緒。對死亡的恐懼......對失敗的恐懼......對孤立和孤單的恐懼。恐懼是我們最強大的動力。能夠控制恐懼的人，就能控制生命。

儘管卡夫卡英年早逝，但他的名字會透過他充滿恐懼和瘋狂的作品一直傳承下去。他獲得了身為人類能夠擁有的最大成就，也就是永生。

我，也將駕馭恐懼的力量，腐蝕這個地獄般的世界。我將重生。以能夠掌管恐懼的姿態重生。卡夫卡只能活在他的作品中。而我所做的一切，卻能讓我永遠活著。"

這一部自由度差一點，更綫性流程，但是解密設計和恐怖氛圍都很棒
不支持21：9分辨率

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198013914001', 'num_games_owned': 1996, 'num_reviews': 919, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1705095472}
review:
Apesar de ter adorado o 1o, não posso recomendar esse.
Não que o jogo não seja bom. É um ótimo jogo.
O problema são as decisoes da CAPCOM.
Diferente do primeiro jogo que era um jogo completo, esse foi fatiado em 4 episodios. Você vai precisar pagar 4x para poder jogar o jogo completo.
O jogo é 9 anos atrás e claro que vai disponivel por meios 'alternativos', Mesmo assim a capcom foi lá e adicionou um DRM pesado.
O jogo também tem vários problemas técnicos que não vi no anterior, como não suportar 60+fps nem widescreen

author: {'steamid': '76561198378621409', 'num_games_owned': 355, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1706566815}
review: Resident Evil evrenine hastayım. Çok beğendiğim bir oyun serisidir. Karakterleri ve hikayeleri... Fakat param olmadığı için yeni çıkan (son 1-2 yıl) oyunlarını alamadım diğerleri de eski diye almamıştım. Ama gerçekten efsane bir oyun serisi dediğim gibi ben çok beğeniyorum. Yeni çıkan oyunları yayıncılar ve youtuberlar oynarken izleyip bitirmiştim. Bu oyunun co-op modunu çalıştıramadım arkadaşımla oynayacaktık ama oynayamadık. İncelememi biraz geç yazdım. Steam kuru dolara geçmeden önce 2 lira gibi bir fiyata aldığımı hatırlıyorum. Lady Hunk hayranı olsamda Jessica Sherawat'ı da beğeniyorum. Bu oyundan sonra Moira'yı da beğenmeye başladım ama hiçbiri bana Lady Hunk kadar çekici gelmiyor. Lady Hunk tarzı bana çok çekici geldi baya beğeniyorum onun dışında Gina Foley de bana çekici geliyor. O bacaklar falan... Her gördüğümde erekte oluyorum ama Lady Hunk'ı hiçbir Resident Evil serisindeki başka bir kadın karaktere değişmem. Onun da bacakları çok fena. Bazen vpn açıp nsfw içerikli fanart sitelerine giriyorum ve onun ayaklarına bakıyorum. Ada Wong gibi çok bilindik bir karakter olmaması beni daha çok mutlu ediyor. Zaten Ada Wong'un ayaklarını herkes yalıyor ama Lady Hunk'ın o kadar değil. Ada Wong'un ayakları da çok güzel. Süt beyazı ama çok yalandığı için ben yalamazdım şahsen. Lady Hunk'ın ayakları da çok güzel ama Ada Wong'unki kadar küçük değil biraz daha büyük. Ama sorun yok çünkü başkasının yalamadığı ayağı yalamak daha güzel olmalı diye düşünüyorum. Bacakları da çok güzel. Ada Wong'un ayak tasarımı daha estetik fakat Lady Hunk'ın ayakları daha sade ve koku bakımından daha ferahlatıcı buluyorum. Ada Wong'un ayakları yalama bakımından daha hoş ve estetik dursa da fan sayısı fazla olduğu için dediğim gibi ayaklarının daha önceden yalanmış olma ihtimali çok yüksek bu yüzden ben Lady Hunk'ın ayaklarını yalamak daha güzel olurdu. Ama bana hangisini yalamak istersin diye sorucak olursanız ben ikisininde ayağını üst üste koyup yalamayı tercih ederdim bir bütün gibi ama isterseniz 2 porsiyon şeklinde de yalayabilirsiniz. Ben şahsen Lady Hunk'ı bu oyun evrenindeki kimseye değişmem. İyi oyunlar dilerim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118069340', 'num_games_owned': 537, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 1608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1462, 'last_played': 1706524923}
review:
[h1] Возвращение в откровения [/h1]

[h1] Сюжет [/h1]
❌ Неповторимый
❌ Запоминающийся
✅ Под пивко пойдёт
❌ Ну такое...
❌ Лучше Дом 2 посмотрю.
◉  Если сравнивать с сюжетом первой Revelations, то здесь он хоть не скатывается в предсказуемую бессмыслицу.
За ним хоть интересно следить. И каждая концовка эпизода дает небольшую, но хоть какую-то интригу.

[h1] Графика [/h1]
❌ От реальности не отличить 
❌ Очень приятная картинка
❌ Нормально
✅ Плохая
❌ Опасно для глаз
◉ Эта часть (по сравнению с первым Revelations) не выглядит как какой-то порт с портативки, но графика все равно плоховата.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3149406493
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3149406460 
Первое что вам бросается в глаза, это зернистость в плохо освещенных помещениях. Вместо графики мы получаем месиво из зернистости.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3149406821
Скриншот передает только половину этой "графики".

[h1] Геймплей [/h1]
❌ Этим можно заниматься вечно
❌ Очень интересно играть
✅ Просто геймплей
❌ Немного скучно
❌ Похоже разрабы го*на поели
◉ Мне не понравилась идея с 2 управляемыми персонажами (конечно если вы играете в соло. В коопе, у каждого будет свой персонаж). Нам по 300 раз нужно будет нажимать кнопку TAB. Сделали бы например как в 5 части. Где искусственный напарник сам двигается и выполняет действия, нужно для продвижения игры по сюжету.
Во всем остальном - это классический Resident Evil с мини-головоломками, беготня по уровню и редкое толкание предметов. Если играли предыдущие части, то здесь не потеряетесь.

[h1] Саунд [/h1]
❌ Добавил сразу в свой плейлист
❌ Очень хороша
❌ Сойдёт 
✅ Что-то играет на заднем фоне
❌ Лучше включу радио на фоне.
◉ Саундтрек в игре довольно неброский. За 20+ часов, я не помню ни одного мотива.

[h1] Сложность [/h1]
❌ Лучше скачаю Trainer , чем в это играть
❌ Срака подгорела
❌ Сложновато
✅ Иногда потно
❌ Прошел одной ногой
◉ Игру я проходил на максимальной сложности. И именно эта сложность как раз оптимальная. Здесь в меру хватает патронов и хилок (конечно если у вас руки из правильного места и пользуетесь уворотами).
Было пару моментов, когда пришлось перезагрузиться, но не более.

[h1] Сложность достижений [/h1]
❌ Перебор коллекционного мусора
✅ Нужно несколько прохождений
✅ Без руководства не обойтись
❌ Получил за одно прохождение
❌ Их здесь нет
◉ Чтобы получить все достижения, игру нужно пройти 3 раза. Также нужно немного поиграть в режим "Рейд".

[h1] Техническая часть [/h1]
❌ Поиграю на компьютере Пентагона
❌ Мощный
❌ Нормальный
❌ На бюджетном запустится 
✅ Пойдет на очень слабом PC  
◉  На RX 580, максимальных настройках и FULL HD - игра показывает стабильные 120 фпс (так как здесь стоит ограничение на 120 кадров).
На более слабых видеокартах (например GT 440) игра показывает 35-40 фпс на минимальных настройках и 720P. Как для бюджетной видеокарты 2010 года, довольно неплохой результат.

[h1] Продолжительность [/h1]
❌ Пока играл - постарел 
❌ Довольно длинная
✅ Средняя
❌ Короткая
❌ Думал пролог , а уже конец
◉ Если не собирать коллекционные предметы, то прохождение займет 8 часов.

[h1] Цена [/h1]
❌ Лучше задонать в Brawl Stars
❌ Нужно подумать над покупкой
✅ Только по скидке
❌ Можно брать за полную стоимость 
❌ Бесплатна
◉ Версия Resident Evil Revelations 2 / Biohazard Revelations 2 Deluxe Edition обошлась мне со скидкой 65% в 24 турецких лир (когда лира была имба в плане цены). Сейчас она обойдется в 3.82 турецких $, 161 грн. или 1972 тенге.В RU стиме игра не продается. 
Рекомендую брать по скидке.

[h1] Баги [/h1]
❌ Cyberpunk 2077 на максималках
❌ Иногда прям бесят 
❌ Много
✅ Несколько раз попадались
❌ Тут просто нечему баговать
◉ За все прохождение встретил несколько багов. И то связанные с застреванием врагов в текстурах.

[h1] + ПЛЮСЫ [/h1]
[b] Оптимизация [/b]

[h1] - МИНУСА [/h1]
[b] Графика [/b]
[b] Управление двумя персонажами в соло игре [/b]

[h1] Вывод [/h1]
Если эту часть сравнивать с первым Revelations, 5 и 6 частью, то она мне больше всего понравилась. Это далеко не самый лучший Resident Evil. До оригинальной 4 и 7 ей очень далеко. Но все равно получилась неплохая игра на один раз.
7.5/10 игра заслуживает.

❌ 10 бал.
❌ 9 бал.
❌ 8 бал
✅ 7.5 бал.
❌ 7 бал.
❌ 6 бал.
❌ 5 бал.
❌ 4 бал.
❌ 3 бал.
❌ 2 бал.
❌ 1 бал.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157573017', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1706481118}
review:
O jogo é massa, história legal mas a análise negativa é que você tem que COMPRAR os episódios. Acho isso um desrespeito enorme com o consumidor e isso devia ser abolido da indústria dos games. É igual você querer ir comprar uma peça de roupa e ter que pagar pela outra metade pra ter o produto completo. Que falta de respeito com os fãs de Resident Evil. Achei isso disparate. Quem achar ruim, me processe. 

Edit end-game: Após eu gastar alguns pontos Steam eu descobri que você não compra somente os demais episódios (são 4) e ainda tem dois capítulos extras, totalizando 6. Continuo achando isso tudo uma falta de respeito com os jogadores, mas quem quiser se aventurar nesse jogo, boa sorte. E o ÚNICO ponto positivo desse jogo, foi conhecer a maravilhosa Claire Redfield. Um imenso prazer, sem dúvidas. ♥

review:
Самая худшая часть RE
Управление за двух героев очень не удобная 
Управление в игре какое-то пьяное, нужно выпить что бы было комфортно играть таким управлением
Пишут игра по сети но она не по сети, сюжетка уж точно
Зомби баганные прыгают сквозь стены и хватают хз как, а иногда игнорируют уклонение 
Читать русские субтитры просто не возможно когда они быстро обе говорят ибо переключение субтитров очень быстрое 
Короче за 1 час игры я обнаружил уйму минусов в игре
Зато продают за безумные деньги да ещё и кусками, каждый эпизод покупай отдельно… бред!
Оценка: -0 (Это просто позор а не игра)

author: {'steamid': '76561198066244543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 1499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1046, 'last_played': 1707119929}
review:
说下这款移植作品的问题：1，由于这款游戏的开发费用被大量削减，且最初登录平台是掌机，在之后移植其他平台，虽然开发素材是4K，但画面落伍，是XBOX360时期的画面质感，再加上滤镜，给人感觉观感并不好；2，作为一款移植作品，包括主机平台在内的所有平台移植非常糟糕，游戏的地图场景是切换场景加载地图，这也直接导致每次载入新场景都会有卡顿。3，这是我给差评的原因，游戏的优化和移植各类问题导致游戏有些BUG，且令我意外的是，作为正版，这款游戏的第四章贝瑞篇最终威斯克战会触发致命BUG，当过场动画结束后，游戏的键鼠和手柄按键会完全失效，且重装游戏和修复完整性无法解决，为什么我会感到意外呢，因为我玩过主机板和PC的盗版，且都未触发过此BUG，可见开发组的极度不负责任，当然，此移植作品还有突击模式闪退BUG，令人感到又气又好笑。
作为旧生化剧本和玩法的延续，启示录1和2 都做的非常好玩，且在保留双人的情况下依然拥有足够的惊悚和恐怖要素，做的确实很好，差不多就是旧生化余孽，可惜以后是看不到这个组开发续作了，这个外传系列剧情和玩法又是否会代入到正传中也让人颇为唏嘘，但愿启示录这个外传能得到母公司的最起码尊重吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198353508019', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1692549997}
review:
Resident Evil Revelations 2 - Una Doble Aventura de Terror y Supervivencia

Calificación: ★★★★☆

Resident Evil Revelations 2 lleva a los jugadores a una experiencia de survival horror envolvente, dividida en episodios que exploran dos tramas entrelazadas. Con su enfoque en la cooperación entre personajes, narrativa intrigante y elementos clásicos de la serie, Revelations 2 ofrece una emocionante doble dosis de terror.
Narrativa Dual y Personajes Memorables

La trama de Revelations 2 se presenta en dos líneas temporales, siguiendo a Claire Redfield y Moira Burton en un lado, y a Barry Burton junto a Natalia Korda en el otro. La narrativa intrigante se desarrolla de manera efectiva, presentando personajes memorables y revelando conexiones sorprendentes con el universo Resident Evil.
Cooperación entre Personajes y Uso de Habilidades Únicas

El juego fomenta la cooperación entre personajes, ya que cada pareja tiene habilidades únicas que deben aprovecharse para superar los desafíos. La combinación de la experiencia de personajes veteranos con la frescura de nuevos protagonistas agrega dinamismo a la jugabilidad.
Ambientación Oscura y Diseño de Niveles Tenso

Revelations 2 presenta una ambientación oscura y variada, desde cárceles abandonadas hasta áreas naturales infestadas de peligros. El diseño de niveles crea una tensión palpable, con momentos de exploración, resolución de puzzles y encuentros con horrores biológicos que mantienen la atmósfera de survival horror.
Modo Asalto y Desafíos Adicionales

El modo Asalto permite a los jugadores enfrentarse a hordas de enemigos en escenarios específicos, añadiendo una dimensión adicional al juego. Los desafíos adicionales y la posibilidad de jugar en cooperativo incrementan la rejugabilidad y ofrecen a los jugadores más oportunidades para explorar el juego.
Elementos Clásicos de Resident Evil y Puzzles Ingeniosos

Revelations 2 incorpora elementos clásicos de la serie, como la gestión de recursos y la resolución de puzzles. Los enigmas son ingeniosos y aportan variedad a la experiencia, recordando la esencia del survival horror que los fanáticos de Resident Evil apreciarán.
Conclusión: Una Entrada Envolvente en la Serie Revelations

Resident Evil Revelations 2 se destaca como una entrada envolvente en la serie Revelations, ofreciendo una doble dosis de terror y supervivencia. Con su narrativa dual, cooperación entre personajes y elementos clásicos, el juego proporciona una experiencia rica y satisfactoria para los aficionados del survival horror. ¡Prepárate para enfrentarte a los horrores biológicos en una doble trama llena de suspense y acción!

author: {'steamid': '76561198442545449', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 38288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 157, 'playtime_at_review': 36015, 'last_played': 1712350384}
review:
Shame it didn't get a bigger budget and a bit more time. but Rev 2 is a masterpiece. A lot of mechanics in this game have crept their way into newer titles. Cringy dialogue, zombies & Barry, what more do I need?

Don't buy for COOP unless you want to use cheat engine scripts to make your coop partner more useful. Local play split screen on story only but raid mode allows online play. If you're a resi fan or a newcomer, check this out. If the story isn't for you, you'll sure as hell find some fun in Raid Mode!

author: {'steamid': '76561198162232009', 'num_games_owned': 958, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 862, 'last_played': 1706212663}
review:
Este jogo da série RE é mediano, a história é OK, como a maioria dos jogos da série. Já a ambientação, ou a identidade, fica um pouco parecida com os jogos clássicos, com um pouco mais de ação e também existem umas partes "estranhas" de stealth.

Há duas campanhas: da Claire e do Barry. A da Claire é bem melhor. Fiquei com sono jogando a campanha do Barry. Além disso, há um sistema de dois personagens que você fica alternando, o que é ruim, pois para pegar os itens escondidos só é possível com o personagem secundário.

Sobre o gameplay, ele não parece muito com um jogo de 2015, falta uma fluidez que outros jogos do gênero tem. É muito ruim mirar no jogo com o mouse, pois o jogo emula os movimentos de um analógico, o que é muita sacanagem e falta de consideração da CAPCOM.

Por fim, o jogo também apresenta alguns congelamentos e quedas de FPS.

Só recomendo quando tiver em uma promoção bem boa.

review:
Okay RE game. AI is bad, but it has couch co-op. Thanks to Steam Remote play you can play together. Downside is it's a hassle to get it to work and the split screen is horrible, and the sound being trash or not existet for the other party is also just a real shame. Wish you could just play online together like you can in RE5 and RE6. Still managed to play through the whole game with a friend, alongside these grievances though. 

I say you should only bother with his one if you're a fan of the series like we are. It's not awful but also not amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330990818', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 443, 'last_played': 1705684064}
review:
OVERVIEW: Given I played regularly the first 3 CAPCOM iterations of the Resident Evil saga on PS1 and later on some of the other versions, to a lesser extent, I was so hyped when I bought RE Revelations 2 because I could turn back the tides of time.


Pros
-» Gameplay: well thought out, you can make a dash forward to escape or turn 180º in a blink of an eye to prevent getting ambushed. Meaningful characters with distinct skills and weapons
-» Soundtrack and sound effects: blends well with the ambience with convincing sound effects to back it up
-» Graphics: gloomy but not to a state that is a nuisance. Spetacular checkpoints movies 
-» Bosses: none on this first episode but that just makes you interested on the next ones!
-» Replayability: Decent since you can shop to upgrade your skills onto higher difficulty levels
-» Difficulty: very balanced
Cons
-» Would enjoy a bit longer episode 1 but that isn’t a deterrent for me to recommend RE R2 

SUMMARY: Valuable game with the benefit of buying it cheaper and see how much you enjoy each episode before acquiring the rest. Joyful co-op synergy if you have a teammate around too
7.5/10 gaming scale


Disclosure: After clearing the main campaign and, as I comeback for new sessions or new updates arise by developers, I intend to keep revising this review

author: {'steamid': '76561198028972635', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1031, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 959, 'last_played': 1705932820}
review: Fun, disturbing, and emotional. I love Resident evil games in general, but as of late they've shifted the focus more on action rather than horror aspects.  The twisted story is quite interesting. It takes place in two different timelines which is an interesting concept. There are also multiple different characters to control with different objectives which adds some change and pace to the franchise. The story revolves around the events on an isolated island where an experiment has gone terribly wrong and has had grisly short- and long-term consequences. The different chapters are very challenging, detailed and long. The opponents are at times tough to fight, especially the bosses. The most recent editions even include two bonus episodes among other elements. All in all, a must have for fans of survival horror and action alike.

review:
I gotta say, I was dearly impressed by this game.
Resident Evil Revelations 2 is a really good game, the story was deeply amazing with a lot of twists and fun things but I must say, this game also suffered from cringe dialogues coming from Moira and Barry.
The ending was great, for some reasons I thought this game was supposed to be way shorter that all the others but once again this shows me that the new remakes (2 and 3, remake for 4 was extremely good) were poorly made.
The zombies had nice designs, we have some animal zombies too plus a "Tyrant".
9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197971120253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1703367541}
review: CAPCOM is forgetting that people play games to enjoy them. What makes me enjoy a game may not be exactly what makes you enjoy it. There is a variety of ways to experience a game and if someone cheats on a single player game, that is between them and God. If someone mods a character to have different color hair, or more relieving cloths, or no cloths at all, that is between them and who ever wandered into their no-escape, fun-time, basement play-land. Forcing people to play a game a certain way is a sign of someone who has to be in total control. If CAPCOM was more creative as of late, their fans wouldn't be resorting to modding games so much.

author: {'steamid': '76561198984533374', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 500, 'last_played': 1679163233}
review:
Very good game but with technical deficiencies.

Pros:
Atmosphere: 9/10
Campaign: 9/10 (Well thought out and with love of the game developed)
Characters: 8/10 (The idea with the little Natalia as a character, I think it's great)
Motivation / Replayability: 9/10
Gameplay/Control: 8/10
English voices: 8/10
Price-performance ratio: 9/10

Cons:
1. Dips in the frame rate in Raid mode and after loading operations in the campaign. "On my PC"

2. The graphic partially builds up too late. Example: The details of a tree in Barry campaign change only when one is very close to the tree. "On my PC"

author: {'steamid': '76561197977460072', 'num_games_owned': 2579, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1635703773}
review:
CAPCOM una vez mas fastidiando a los jugadores que pagan por sus juegos. Esta vez han bloqueado todos los mods con una actualización en la mayoria de sus juegos, incluido los antiguos, que tiene problemas de rendimiento, bajada de FPS, incompatibilidades, bugs, problemas con Steam Deck, etc.

Me parece un maltrato a los jugadores y a los que ponemos el dinero. Los Mods pueden servir para muchas cosas, pero no son tranpas, son buscarte tu propio estilo dentro de un juego.

Mis reviews quedarán todas negativas hasta que la compañía rectifique de forma publica.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037566932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1913, 'last_played': 1705554906}
review:
years ago would have given this a 9/10, probably the best, if not one of the best RE games i've played, which are most at this point.

now however, I am entirely unable to even launch the game and can only assume this is due to Capcom Fuckery behind the scene as multiple Capcom games are giving "anti Virus" errors from steam, with no actual information or support for this available from my searching online. I have played this game on this very computer before, so after multiple installs, verifying files, etc...  I feel it's safe to say this is due to Capcom as this had never been an issue prior with no solutions working from my PC. additionally, this issue ALSO applied to RE Remaster, which then magically fixed itself with no changes on my end, making it seem far more likely to be some sort of issue stemming from the game itself due to Capcom from everything i have been able to figure out so far.

author: {'steamid': '76561199006424703', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1653526547}
review:
I have only 24 minutes in the game, put it on the backburner to enjoy it later, I was looking forward to it, but now I can't anymore, because CAPCOM decided to be an absolute consumer despising tool, and injected some shady back alley DRM into their old games, partially under the guise of "bug fixes", and then not even mentioned that 3rd party "DRM" on the store page, so now I cannot trust any of their code anymore, because they showed that they will happily sneak untrustworthy code on my system without a care in the world.

The fact that this is allowed on Steam is an absolute shame, and frankly sheds a bad light on Valve, which so far I held in somewhat high regard, but my trust in them starts crumbling.

Thanks for nothing CAPCOM.

author: {'steamid': '76561199074493962', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1692561256}
review:
do not recommend a game from a Company who adds an awful path as DRM Enigma Protector,

As a lot of people says:

The DRM only works for

-Preventing modding
-No Cheat engine to make performance and changes to help gamers with performance issues
-Reduces performance by up to 10-15 fps, Stutters and crashes to gamers who bought the games legally.

This is basically the equivalent of a coffee shop telling you that you cannot put unauthorized creamer in to "their" coffee after you bought it already.

As please remember Capcom slipped a rootkit into Street Fighter 5 back in 2016 with an anti-cheat update. They reversed that decision after significant backlash, honestly pass from capcom is the only approach we have to make them see we do not like this witch hunt...

review:
EW. WTF did they do to Claire? She got so fugly in this one. They absolutely ruined my favourite character in this game. All to pander to realistic standards..... because, a game about super mutant zombies is ultra realistic.
Game was ugly then, it's even uglier now. 

Also you should avoid it and any other game by this developer. 

They tried to sneak in drm to Revelations 1 that prevents mods and will impact performance. They will do this to every single game, even ones released decades ago. Not to mention, who knows what kind of data harvesting they have planned, maybe social security numbers, personal id's, credit card numbers, banking details, passport info, etc.

Would you trust this company with your personal info after they had a data breach just in the last few years? How about one that retroactively takes away your enjoyment?

review:
Capcom has been sneaking in Enigma DRM on their older games with an update purely to block modding. This DRM causes performance issues, crashes and has broken Steam Deck support on some games. Enigma has been known to trigger antivirus programs since it’s also malware. Do not support this anti consumer company, they want to destroy modding to sell you skins and microtransactions!

Capcom won’t fix their old games but they’ll gladly add malware DRM on decade old games for petty reasons. Retroactively adding DRM on old games is not only disgusting but completely unacceptable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084650377', 'num_games_owned': 299, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2105, 'last_played': 1611651910}
review:
User-
"Capcom has implemented your product on their back catalogue of games and it's causing performance drops, crashes and has broken many popular mods people use to make these games run better.

The PC community is very angry and has noticed the implementation of your product. It is being mentioned in a ton of negative steam reviews.

You should be aware that there is likely a huge negative PR storm coming your way and possibly offer Capcom advice on how to implement your product properly as you've angered a lot of people. It wouldn't surprise me if big PC YouTubers like Digital Foundry pick up on the issue and make their many subscribers aware."

Enigma (Who made capcoms DRM) -
 "Curious, what action do you need from us? And why do you blame us that someone use our software? Someone use, we do not push to use it.
What is our guilt you think?
And why are you so sure that all that you reported belongs to our software?
Maybe you are so angered because you can't use the cheats anymore?"

So basically blaming people who support your games for wanting software that damages the games natural experience to not damage the natural experience AS WELL AS many others wanting to be able to mod the SINGLE PLAYER games that they bought. If someone bought your game, its a single player experience and they arent impacting any other players experience, then they should absolutely be able to experience the game they want to

Leaving a negative review hurts your games reputation and its a valid reason to leave a negative review on all of my owned capcom titles as the company clearly hates its customers, even going so far as to cripple or take down youtubers channels because they used Speedrun mods (like wtf). Capcom doesnt respect its customers, so as a customer ill do what I can to show displeasure.

review: Everyone should only look to the anti-consumer move Capcom pulled of adding DRM years after the fact to their games SOLELY to prevent mods from running as to why they should NOT buy ANY Capcom games. DRM that not only blocks mods, but ALSO ruins performance and has allegedly even bricked Steam Decks. All to stop you from using mods because they consider mods cheating. Yes, fixing the FOV (which should be a slider in every PC game) is cheating. Changing the outfits your character wears is cheating. Fixing bugs is cheating. Show Capcom how out of touch they are. Do NOT buy their games and let them know in reviews of their games this isn't acceptable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165603553', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1727, 'last_played': 1710146614}
review:
Capcom adding DRM to their older titles

The game overall is meh. The story was dull except for the end with alex wesker, which we will likely never get any follow up on. The gameplay in the story mode wasnt that good either. the story mode was the least exciting part of this game. what really shines here is the raid mode, which kept me playing the game for months when it released. It really lets the gameplay mechanics be used to their full potential and offers a lot of upgrades for your characters and guns. They should make an entire game with just the raid mode expanded more, instead of throwaway games like resistence
