author: {'steamid': '76561198065928992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 2186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2186, 'last_played': 1704928506}
review:
[h1]CATEGORIA A[/h1]
Jogo muito bom na história e imersão, estando muito próxima da categoria de Resident Evil. Os gráficos estão simples, porém bem otimizados e fluídos. Jogo possui boa qualidade também, não apresentando problemas para rodar. Jogabilidade muito boa. Recomendo. Só não espere um jogo com aquela essência de um Resident Evil.

author: {'steamid': '76561199077011820', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1703440307}

author: {'steamid': '76561197996653035', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 3244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3244, 'last_played': 1574528198}
review:
I've been a huge Capcom fan since getting my Playstation 1. Resident Evil was the first game I got for it and I had played only played Mario and Sonic games before. Talk about a shock! I was hooked!

The implementation of Enigma DRM is the end of the road for me. Not 1 but 2 types of DRM (Denuvo) now? The developer of Enigma is questionable at best as well.

For what though? Because a streamer used a nude mod in a public forum? So the entire PC community gets punished? So people can no longer use tools like Cheat Engine to reduce some of the grind so you can push more paid DLC to reduce the grind (weapon vouchers)?

I'm not mad really, just disappointed. I will not be buying games developed or published by you anymore though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095415786', 'num_games_owned': 1726, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1549265430}
review:
WARNING: In what can only be interpreted as an internal competition between Capcom and other companies, Capcom has decided to start adding an invasive DRM to their old games (soon coming to the new ones too). The Enigma DRM's sole function is to prevent players from modding their games, but it also comes with other drawbacks, such as:
- Making performance worse, lowering FPS by between 10 and 15.
- Rendering games unplayable on the Steam Deck.
- Allowing games to randomly crash for no reason.
Capcom needs pushback on this; don't let them get away with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067090064', 'num_games_owned': 804, 'num_reviews': 372, 'playtime_forever': 1346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1705182433}
review:
После неприятной и нелепой первой Revelations, я б ни за что не стал играть во вторую часть. Но её так хвалили...
И, спасибо DEAD Moroz за такой подарок мне в честь выйгрыша в небольшой викторине))

Эта игра, однозначно, лучше первой части.
- Более обширные и интересные локации.
- Персонажи выглядят как нормальные люди.
- Нет этого надоедающего сканирования всего для добычи ресурсов.
- Нет закоса под сериал. Главы по пол часа напрягали в первой части.

Но теперь о плохом.
- Нет задницы Джилл.
- Сканирование заменили на аналогичную фигню. Твой напарник может подсветить скрытый предмет. Но для этого нужно переключиться на напарника, или играть им постоянно. Однако, напарники не имеют основной огневой мощи. Так что, снова приходится терпеть.
- Я не буду жаловаться на управление, оно в игре нормальное. Но прокачка! Очень странная прокачка заставляет вас играть на геймпаде как на пианино! Чтоб вы понимали, самая большая огневая мощь будет у вас, если после каждого выстрела, вы будете менять игрового персонажа и менять оружие в его руках, в положении присяда. Также, помимо уворота, при приседании можно получить короткую неуязвимость. Но, благо, для прохождения игры не обязательно скакать между персонажами и постоянно приседать и вставать. Однако, прокачка подразумевает такие действия. Это странно.
- Сюжет игры покатит. Но почему такие нездоровые диалоги? Почему люди так плохо разговаривают? А ну да, наверное потому, что заражены вирусом.
Про концовку, пожалуй говорить особо не буду. ЭТО надо видеть самому. Как можно было так оБэнниХиллить такой эпичный момент?!

Вобщем, моя оценка 7 Вескеров из 10.
Поиграть можно, даже местами приятно. Но с фейспалмом на лице.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033995360', 'num_games_owned': 2161, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 1185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1185, 'last_played': 1667928863}
review:
Gameplay. Graphismes. Level design. Musiques. Game design. Bon. Mauvais. Beau. Moche. Ce ne sont que des tags que j'utilise pour éviter que Steam ne filtre cette évaluation et ne la range dans la poubelle avec les autres évaluations "non pertinentes" alors qu'elle est très, très pertinente selon moi.

Capcom se permet de faire des mises à jour sur des jeux vieux de dix ans pour y rajouter des [b]D[/b]ead [b]R[/b]ed [b]M[/b]ésopotamie, et ainsi limiter notre accès aux jeux que nous avons payés. Imaginez que Conforama se pointe chez vous dix ans plus tard pour rajouter un cadenas à l'un des tiroirs de votre congélateur. De vraies pratiques d'enc....oh hisse ! Les joueurs qui paient leur jeu sont punis d'avoir payé leur jeu, tandis que les corsaires ont la belle vie. Puisque je ne serai jamais remboursé pour les jeux que j'ai achetés et dont Capcom se permet de modifier les fichiers des années plus tard pour m'en limiter l'accès, je sais où me procurer les jeux Capcom, à l'avenir. Et ça ne me coûtera pas un sou. La vie est belle avec le cache-oeil, la jambe de bois qui cache une bouteille de rhum, et le perroquet fidèlement attaché à l'épaule droite qui répète en boucle "pièces de huit ! pièces de huit !"

author: {'steamid': '76561198034783301', 'num_games_owned': 621, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1679120565}
review:
I will not stand for getting a lesser product for supporting you.

I don't give af that you're butthurt about some random dudes Chun-Li mod that doesn't mean it's right to punish everyone that supports your games with a DRM filled game that doesn't give the people who pay for your games the ability to make their experience unique, fun, and replayable. To add to that the fact that the games now perform at lower frame rates, suffer from stutters, crashes, and even some people reporting on the games just not working anymore.

Meanwhile the pirates get the definitive experience. They get a game that performs better, and they get the ability to modify their experience.

Capcom is starting to show their inner Crapcom.

You guys gotta stop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082927681', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1707898117}

review:
Well I should start with this. The game is absolutely broken. Tried everything in my power to fix this, but everytime I access the inventory (with any items from the inventory) or try to analyze some blueprints I got in raid. It crashes.

So the whole playtime was just about fixing stuff and crashing. Couldn't even get through 5 minutes of gameplay without it crashing eventually.

Going to change this review to positive, if the crashing problem is solved. Can't really recommend this mess.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098987516', 'num_games_owned': 482, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1613250563}
review:
Capcom is adding DRM Enigma Protector to its new and even old games on Steam. This DRM decreases game performance by 15 fps, causes frequent stuttering and blocks modding.

Most of these games were cracked by pirates a long time ago and while pirates who didn't pay for the game play the games without the new DRM damaging the game's performance, those who paid for the game are suffering from the games' performance being impaired thanks to the new DRM. This encourages piracy.

Many Capcom games have problems that have not been officially fixed by the company and there are mods made by the passionate community of fans that fix these problems. Mods greatly improve games, increasing their replayability. Blocking mods is unacceptable.

That's why I'm leaving this negative review. If you were planning on buying this game, don't do it. I recommend buying these games on consoles where your performance is not hampered by DRM.

If Capcom decides to go back and remove this new DRM, I will go back and remove my negative review as well.
